entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
